attributes.action: Saudi Arabia should house Syrian refugees in  'King abdullahs economic city'.
attributes.background: It has been built for up to 2 million people and currently only has 5000 residents. It is potentially going to be moth balled. They should be helping the neighbours from the region and fellow Muslims and taking the burden off turkey, Jordan and Greece who do not have the facilities or money.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to raise this suggestion with the Government of Saudi Arabia.
